A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very sloppy and weak plot points\, \, many\, many character inconsistencies\, and total dismantling of the previous StarWars movie. Visually stunning\, but ma'am has this franchise been headed in the wrong direction for a very long time. I'm pretty disappointed in the overall franchise at this point. Next movie\, I might just wait for Redbox\, if that. I grew up with this franchise\, it's really a shame what Disney has done with it.
